title: Knife, 1985-103-118-b, ca. 1750
markings: On each piece in set: Dutch import mark: " ..ZII " ; Tardy, SILVER, 1981, p.327
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade with plain bolster. Octagonal silver ferrule. Agate handle, octagonal in section, tapering towards the top.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
